author: pavignol
content:
Hey everyone! I made a C++ client for the ceremony: https://github.com/PatriceVignola/cpp-kzg-ceremony-client
It supports most features, including BLS/ECDSA signing. How can I add it to the list of clients on https://github.com/ethereum/kzg-ceremony ? Should I just make a PR?
Thanks!

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> Great work @pavignol! Yes please, a PR would be great!

author: pavignol
content: Great, thanks! I made a PR https://github.com/ethereum/kzg-ceremony/pull/28
